job.title: Key Account Manager - Central European Market

description.role:

job.title: Mobile UA Specialist (h/m) - Social Game Developer

description.role:
• Manage and track your campaigns in order to guarantee their optimization.
  • Manage negotiation with partners to achieve Volume, Quality and ROI goals.
  • Buy media through Facebook, Google, DSP or other providers.
  • Develop creative and innovative solutions for customer acquisition.
  • Work together with the Analytics & Product teams to optimize campaigns.

bulletPoints.bulletPoints_0: Opportunity for experienced (3+ years) mobile acquisition specialist
bulletPoints.bulletPoints_1: Worldwide mobile games leader based in Barcelona

description.candidate:
This is you Analytical, problem solver, proactive, team worker, rigorous and detail oriented. You are smart, creative and practical at the same time. You also have
  • 3 years of experience managing, growing and optimizing mobile acquisition campaigns through Facebook, Google, Ad networks, DSP or any other media platform.
  • Strong Excel and analytical skills.
  • Ability to compile and analyse performance data and metrics.
  • Passion for results, consistent track record of exceeding targets.
  • Experience buying, negotiating and analysing media.
  • Strong understanding and experience with iOS and Android marketplaces.
  • Clear understanding of how to take the most of the providers algorithms.
  • Clear understanding of fraud bechmarks.
  • You also have experience using PMDs / FMPs, and attribution platforms
description.company: Worldwide mobile games leader
description.deal:
• All the resources you need for your work: the newest and most powerful devices & equipment and even a Spotify Premium account.
  • Professional growth opportunities, supported by a performance review process, internal mobility and amazing training budgets.
  • A healthy Monday breakfast and a delicious daily lunch menu.
  • A brand new gym and football and basketball teams.
  • Monthly events and an in-office hairdresser.
  • Weekend activities once a month, Spanish lessons and help with all your boring paperwork ;)
The list of advantages goes on and on..

summary.content: Do you want to be part of a worldwide mobile games leader? Our client is an international company existing of about 300 talented professionals, based in sunny and cosmopolitan Barcelona. They create amazing games, positioned in the top rankings of both iOS and Android, that are played and loved by over 50 million fans all over the world.
summary.title: Mobile UA Specialist - Social Game Developer in Barcelona

description.role:
Do głównych zadań na tym stanowisku należeć będą:
  • diagnostyka, naprawa i rozbudowa układów elektrycznych, pneumatyki i systemów sterowania z PLC i systemów wizyjnych;
  • analiza programów PLC pod kątem diagnostyki złożonych problemów;
  • reagowanie na notyfikacje i awarie w celu utrzymanie ruchu zakładu;
  • precyzyjne raportowanie problemów i podjętych działań.
description.candidate:
Od kandydatów oczekiwane będą:
  • wykształcenie minimum średnie w zakresie: automatyka, elektronika, mechatronika lub elektryka;
  • minimum 2 lata doświadczenia w dziale Utrzymaniu Ruchu;
  • znajomość podstawowych układów elektrycznych, pneumatyki i systemów sterowania z PLC;
  • znajomość budowy i diagnostyki PLC oraz paneli HMI;
  • biegła umiejętność czytania schematów elektrycznych;
  • gotowość do pracy w równoważnym 12-godzinnym systemie pracy;
  • dodatkowym atutem będzie znajomość: środowiska SIMATIC STEP7, oprogramowania PacDrive diagnostic, EPAS-4, sieci Profibus, Devicenet i Ethernet.

job.title: Financial Planning & Analysis Expert (New Operations Center)

description.role:
• Analyzes current and past trends in key performance indicators; monitor performance indicators, highlighting trends and analyzing causes of unexpected variance
  • Calculates prices and their impact per channel/segment/customer and highlights areas for margin improvement
  • Monitors brand, product, customer profitability
  • Develops financial models and analyses to support strategic initiatives (pricing, sale force effectiveness, cost to serve etc)
  • Drives the continued development of the planning and forecasting processes
  • Measures forecast accuracy and highlights to the Navigators areas for improvementProactively seeks opportunities to improve and standardize data reports to gain efficiency
  • Eliminates, simplifies, standardizes and automates outputs in a structured and consistent manner
  • Shares best practice among the team and other regions

bulletPoints.bulletPoints_1: Supports continuous improvements and standardization initiatives

description.candidate:
• 4-5 years of experience as analyst or as controller in a business environment and/or functional area
  • Eager to learn and always searching for improvement opportunities
  • Strong analytical skills combined with a critical, but constructive, attitude
  • Experience in building automated reports and models is a must; excellent financial and analytical skills
  • HFM system experience preferred or BI systems experience
  • Strong analytic skills and the ability to analyze, organize, summarize and articulate complex financial information for decision making
  • Possess excellent written and verbal communication skills in English, including ability to articulate recommendations in a concise and timely manner
  • Able to prioritize and work with multiple supervisors
  • Strong 'can-do' mentality and 'drive' to accomplish tasks in an environment with multiple stakeholders
  • Being able to make independent interpretation, draw conclusions and propose solutions
  • Experience in 'change management' in a finance environment is preferred

description.deal:

  • Friendly atmosphere
  • Modern and colorful office

description.role:
Do kluczowych obowiązków Kandydata należeć będą:
  • Tworzenie, implementacja oraz egzekucja strategii trade marketingowej dla kluczowych brandów;
  • Działania, mające na celu poszerzanie zakresu brand awarness na rynku polskim;
  • Tworzenie materiałów marketingowych, w tym digitalowych - zarówno osobiście, jak i we współpracy z agencjami zewnętrznymi;
  • Współpraca cross-działowa, m.in. z działami sprzedaży (analiza i kontrola stocku), logistyki, czy księgowości (raportowanie oraz praca w SAP);
  • Kontrolowanie designu, treści i procesu implementacji opakowań oraz etykiet poszczególnych produktów;
  • Monitoring rynków oraz działań konkurencji - rekomendowanie strategii w oparciu o insighty konsumenckie;
  • Regularne uczestnictwo w spotkaniach sprzedażowych na poziomie lokalnych i rzadziej - międzynarodowym;
  • Zarządzanie pracą asystenta, dającego bieżące wsparcie osobie na tym stanowisku;
  • Reprezentowanie Klienta podczas różnorodnych wydarzeń, w tym wobec przedstawicieli mediów.

bulletPoints.bulletPoints_0: 2-letnie doświadczenie w trade marketingu w branży FMCG w mniejszych strukturach

description.candidate:
Od Kandydata na tym stanowisku oczekuje się:
  • Min. 2-letniego doświadczenia w trade marketingu w branży FMCG po stronie producentów o mniejszych strukturach;
  • Wykształcenia wyższego (preferowane ekonomiczne);
  • Znajomości trendów rynkowych oraz insightów konsumenckich;
  • Bardzo dobrej znajomości Pakietu Office (w tym zwłaszcza Power Point oraz Excel);
  • Wielozadaniowości, kreatywności, dużej motywacji do pracy w stylu "all hands onboard", również pod presją czasu - typ "człowieka orkiestry";
  • Bardzo dobrej znajomości języka angielskiego;
  • Mobilności i otwartości na podróże służbowe w kraju i za granicą;
  • Wysokiego poziomu zdolności analitycznych, dużych kompetencji miękkich (relacyjność oraz komunikacja);
  • Chęci poszerzania/doskonalenia swoich kompetencji w trade marketingu oraz szeroko pojętej komunikacji;
  • Doświadczenie w pracy z programem SAP będzie dodatkowym atutem.
description.company: Nasz Klient jest przedstawicielem dwóch niemieckich producentów z branży FMCG, w tym jednego o ponad 100-letniej tradycji w dostarczaniu najwyższej klasy produktów, dostępnych w kilkudziesięciu krajach. Klient jest europejskim liderem innowacji w zakresie produkcji uwzględniającej troskę o środowisko naturalne, a działania przez niego podejmowane spopularyzowały wykorzystanie materiału PET do produkcji wysokiej jakości opakowań nadających się do ponownego recyklingu. W związku z rozwojem działalności, Klient rekrutuje w swoje szeregi nowego członka zespołu marketingowego i oczekuje od niego kompleksowych działań komunikacyjno-trade'owych wobec swoich kluczowych brandów. Założeniem na nowo-obsadzone stanowisko jest wsparcie działu sprzedaży za pomocą wszelkich narzędzi marketing mix, wprowadzenie nowych produktów na rynek polski oraz internacjonalna współpraca z innymi działami przy wdrażaniu innowacji i lokalnych strategii marketingowych.
description.deal:
Klient oferuje:
  • Laptop, telefon komórkowy jako narzędzia do pracy;
  • Atrakcyjne wynagrodzenie oraz system bonusowy;
  • Prywatną opiekę medyczną;

description.role: In this international and innovative team, you will be responsible for creating innovative packaging ideas and ensuring that structural design and prototypes are aligned with customer design intent. We expect you to be able to convert the customers' needs by using your creative expertise to develop new inspiring packaging ideas. You will be responsible for the entire packaging design process from leading workshops with customers to finalise design solutions ready for manufacturing. You will also help strengthen Packaging Solutions' process through which we serve existing and potential customer via design services. You will work close to the Sales teams and Business Development functions but also have direct customer contact and interaction to meet customers' requirements on both technical, functional and innovative level and ensuring that the packages can be manufactured in our factories. Internally you will be closely working with our corrugated Design Studios to utilize the best practices.

bulletPoints.bulletPoints_0: International job opportunity, the position is based in Latvia (beautiful Riga)
bulletPoints.bulletPoints_1: International team, new position in the company, interesting projects

description.candidate:
• Bachelor's degree or equivalent combination of work experience and education.
  • The workplace is located in beautiful Riga, Latvia. Relocation is a must.
  • Experience in structural package design with production experience in the corrugated industry.
  • Demonstrated ability to use structural design software Impact or Artios CAD to produce professional designs.
  • Creative and proactive problem solver with ability to work through processes to identify critical pains and needs from a customer perspective.
  • Ability to quantify the impact and benefits of optimizations in packaging design along value chain and for different customers
  • High verbal and written communication and interpersonal skills with the ability to communicate and cooperate effectively across matrix organisation and with customers
  • To succeed, you also need to be innovative, creative and have good communication skills.
  • High level of English proficiency, fluent written and spoken required.
  • You will be asked for portfolio samples of customer cases.
  • High level of presentation techniques and visualisation.
  • Ability to handle and prioritize multiple projects.
  • You will be reporting to Director Design.
  • International travel is required.
description.company: Are you passionate about creating value for people and the planet through packaging design? Packaging design is an integral part of a new and fast-growing business line in our client business, where there is a need for a commercially minded Structural Designer to set a solid foundation for future growth, while managing ongoing customer engagements.
description.deal: This role is a very unique opportunity to work at a good level and have a direct effect on the success of a growing business. With increased capacity the business is looking to significantly grow over the coming years and this role will form a key component of this growth story. The company is offering an attractive salary package based on skill sets. This role is based in Latvia.

summary.content: We are looking for a highly motivated and skilled Division Designer who has the ability of understanding the customers' business situation and needs and translate it into packaging opportunities for global omnichannel logistics chains. This position involves a wide diversity of work situations and requires the ability to manage multiple projects efficiently. The workplace is located in beautiful Riga, Latvia. Relocation is a must.
summary.title: Division Designer - Packaging Business (corrugated industry)

    developments and changes in the market and use this to inform and update the strategy

description.role:
Reporting directly to the Managing Director and sitting on the board, the Sales Director will be tasked with sales strategy, driving revenue, account retention and management of the sales staff across Europe. Currently there are three sales staff in each of the hubs - the UK, Belgium and Poland. Although the expectation is for the role to be primarily client facing, there is a definite need to cultivate and push relationships internally - specifically with the operations team who execute the solutions sold. In order to do this the SD will be expected to travel fairly extensively to visit stakeholders in other offices, combining this with client visits where possible. Other responsibilities will include:-
  • Working with members of the board on budgeting and planning and presenting sales results on a periodic basis
  • Creating and implementing strategic sales and marketing plans that align with business objectives
  • Developing an operating budget for the sales division
  • Forging positive long-lasting relationships with key clients to understand their business needs and objectives
  • Negotiating agreements for contracts with customers to ensure a commercial outcome
  • Effectively communicating the value proposition through proposals and presentations
  • Serving as a business representative at major industry events, conferences, trade shows, and exhibitions
  • Identifying valuable and viable emerging markets to target
  • Meeting with the sales managers on a monthly basis to assess company performance against KPIs
  • Full responsibility of all sales compliance processes across the business ensuring company and statutory standards and laws are being adhered to at all times

bulletPoints.bulletPoints_0: Leading a sales team across the UK and Europe
bulletPoints.bulletPoints_1: Sitting on the board of the business

description.candidate:
In order to apply for the Sales Director role, candidates must be able to demonstrate significant experience in managing a sales team across multiple countries, winning multi-million Euro/Pound accounts and designing sales strategy. These skill sets will be assessed during a 3 stage interview process that will include a psychometric testing portion and a presentation. Other competencies and experiences that Solstor will be looking for include:-
  • A commercial awareness and strong strategic development skills
  • Five years plus operating at a senior level, with a strong academic background (degree or equivalent)
  • The ability to take the features and benefits of a service portfolio to build powerful business development and marketing campaigns
  • Be charismatic, have strong commercial acumen and demonstrable track record of coaching and mentoring high performing staff
  • Proven experience of delivering results through managing a field based sales teams within a set territory
  • Organised, with meticulous attention to detail
  • Well rounded interpersonal & communication skills, able to prioritise
  • Maintaining effective relationships, focusing on customer needs and being able to gain their commitment
  • Establishing clear, challenging and achievable objectives
  • Regularly reviewing and communicating progress against said objectives, adjusting as needed
  • Championing continuous improvement and innovation, rewarding and recognising the contribution of others
  • Providing employees, colleagues and business partners with candid and regular feedback, development and career opportunities
  • Communicating strategy in a clear and concise way to colleagues, employees and business partners
description.company:
Established in 1983, Solstor UK Ltd was originally created to move produce inbound from Europe to the UK. They quickly realised that it was much more profitable to have the freight full in both directions and so soon after restructured to become a standalone company specialising in temperature controlled storage.
With offices and consolidation centres in the UK, Spain, Italy, Belgium and Poland the business is able to offer solutions on a pan-European basis. This role will require at least 5 days per month based in the head office near Dartford, Kent and there will be frequent travel to mainland Europe to meet clients and colleagues.
description.deal: Dependent on experience, assessed at interview, there is a base salary from £70,000 to £90,000 on offer for the successful candidate. On top of this there will be a bonus, car allowance and other benefits in line with a position at this level.

summary.content: Responsible for sales across Europe, the Sales Director will be expected to build and implement an effective sales strategy for the business. This is a board level role, however the successful candidate will need to lead from the front regularly attending client meetings and driving business development through best practice.
summary.title: Sales Director - Europe wide logistics business

Osoba zatrudniona na tym stanowisku będzie odpowiedzialna za:
  • Organizację pracy zespołu - planowanie grafików, zlecanie prac i kontrolę ich przebiegu, optymalizację zatrudnienia i rekrutację nowych pracowników;

  • Zapewnienie przestrzegania regulaminu pracy, zasad BHP i wszystkich standardów ustanowionych w firmie;
  • Monitorowanie wskaźników KPI w podległym obszarze z wykorzystaniem dostępnych narzędzi, plików, systemów, opracowywanie informacji i analiz, planowanie działań naprawczych i ich wdrażanie;
  • Opracowywanie Planów Produkcji i nadzór nad terminowym ich realizowaniem;
  • Opracowywanie, wdrażanie i aktualizacja instrukcji pracy;
  • Ciągłe doskonalenie procesów;
  • Nadzór nad wdrożeniem nowych projektów do realizacji i ich uruchamianie;
  • Nadzór na kosztami produkcji i podejmowanie działań w kierunku ich minimalizowania;

  • Strategic and operational control of the product portfolio, positioning, market & financial analysis considering regional market requirements (focus on agricultural industry, crop aid and soil culture)
  • Understanding problems of our customers and the requirements of the market. Turn creative solutions into reality
  • Development of sales and marketing concepts along the product life cycle and maximizing the lifetime profitability of products
  • Creation of meaningful business plans and market potential analyzes
  • Lead successful track records and innovation projects from idea to market launch of new products and services
  • Active promotion of experience and knowledge exchange in the company (products, markets, construction methods, competitiors) - Supporting the Business Unit Manager in the evaluation of partners - Managing external partners (R&D partners for commercial products, marketing, industry deals)
  • Developing arguments for the sales organization and conducting international and external product training
  • Ensuring appropriate stakeholder management (Sales, Research, Formulation Development, Controlling, Supply Chain, Quality, Regulatory, Production, Procurement)
  • Independent, solution oriented development and implementation in the area of responsibility
  • Fast, concrete and customized communication and presentation skills
  • Efficient and effective working methods and drive to execute

bulletPoints.bulletPoints_0: Global pioneer of supplying organic pesticides localized in Austria
bulletPoints.bulletPoints_1: New chance and strengthen as a product manager within the agricultural industry

description.candidate:
• Completed agronomist education with a high level of chemical and biological understanding
  • Minimum 5 years marketing or sales experience - Product management experience a plus
  • Knowledge of marketing principles - positioning, market and financial analyses, communications
  • Experience in product or innovation management is an advantage
  • Strong customer focus - sales experience coupled with entrepreneurial thinking
  • Proactive, inspiring personality with the joy of international cooperation
  • Structured and analytical way of working with quick comprehension
  • Very good knowledge of English, other languages beneficial
description.company:
Our customer is a leading supplier of crop protection products in Austria. The high-quality standards, innovative range of services and comprehensive consulting and service activities have made the company a respected partner to the agricultural and international industries.
Have you already gained experience as a Product Manager and now you want to control your own product portfolio and the lifecycle of your systems in the area of organic soil fungicidies?
Do you want to manage international complex projects and guide your project teams with enthusiasm to the goal and success?
For the expansion of the Product Management team in Vienna we are looking for a
description.deal:
We support your professional and personal development and guarantee a competitive and performance-related salary which will depend on your professional and personal qualifications.
We are looking forward receiving your application!

  • Budowanie świadomości organizacyjnej i sprzedażowej, wzmacnianie postaw odpowiedzialności i zaangażowania pracowników w podległym zespole.
  • Sprawowanie odpowiedzialności za kluczowe negocjacje (z wynajmującymi, potencjalnymi partnerami franczyzowymi).
  • Współtworzenie strategii w obszarze rozwiązań produktowych, jak również aktywny udział w tworzeniu marki firmy.
  • Analizowane branży w szczególności monitoring i analiza konkurencji oraz identyfikowanie nowych możliwości rozwoju sprzedaży.
  • Kontrola kosztów i efektywności operacyjnej podległego działu.

description.company:
Nasz Klient poświęca dużo uwagi, na rekrutację doświadczonych i chętnych do nauki osób. Dzięki temu finanse w spółce prowadzone są na bardzo wysokim poziomie, umożliwiając rozwój najmocniejszych stron pracowników, jednocześnie udzielając wsparcia w tych trudniejszych aspektach, związanych z wiedzą merytoryczną- zgodnie z polityką funkcjonowania firmy. Wszelkie zmiany i optymalizacje wdrażane są rozważnie i umiejętnie, co skutkuje poczuciem ogromnej stabilizacji i rozwoju swoich umiejętności.
Osoby, które są nastawione na podejmowanie nowych wyzwań, chętne do pogłębiania swojej wiedzy z zakresu finansów, oraz chętne do współpracy z inspirującymi ludźmi - zachęcamy do aplikacji.

• Responsibility for the structure, vision and strategy shared service development.
  • Simplify, standardize and further centralization of accounting and finance transactional activities.

  • businesses.
  • Shape a culture of innovation, change, execution excellence and excitement within a freshly created team.
  • Manage relationships with key finance and business stakeholders including responding to service delivery questions and issues.
  • Translate business and process improvement strategies into operational objectives and assignments for the group, including resourcing, budget, and commitment plans.
  • Prepare and present monthly & quarterly financial results to the European Board.
  • Maintain and monitor key finance operation process performance metrics and lead and drive business process continuous improvement projects.
  • Ensure balance sheet integrity, compliance with internal control policies (SOX), procedures and regulatory guidelines (e.g. US GAAP and local statutory requirements) for all activities managed by service center.
  • Responsibility of timely, correct tax calculation and submission of tax declarations.
  • Coach and develop team members and perform quarterly performance reviews.

description.role:
The Network & Telecom Service Manager will be leading all worldwide operations around network and telephony, putting in place an efficient global organization, and processes, in order to support and drive this critical infrastructure service, making sure that the support, monitoring, reporting, change management and evolution of network services, are in line with business expectations, offering the end-users a state of the art experience, in consuming digital services.
The ideal candidate is experienced in managing corporate networks, transformation to Hybrid and SDWAN technologies, with an excellent knowledge in cloud-based security solutions. An experience with rolling out, operating or supporting SDWAN technologies would be a plus.
He, She, has the necessary technical knowledge and basics to lead and challenge external telco partners in charge of supporting daily the environment, from a technical and functional perspective. The challenges in regard to latency, peering, SAAS apps, and how network solutions can help in overcoming those challenges, are topics where the service manager needs to show experience and deep knowledge.
Managing teams remotely, leading steering committees, technical decisions, and reporting to C-LEVEL are part of the expectations in regard to this position.
This is a unique opportunity to be in the heart of the Team that will build the future global network of Page Group, and a contributor to a transformation that will enable digital projects and transformation.
You will be joining an international and talented team, working in a great environment, with more than 40 nationalities working all together in the same shared service center, engaging on daily basis with teams from all around the world.
Candidates looking for relocation are welcomed.

bulletPoints.bulletPoints_0: Great career opportunities within a fast growing international company

  • Bachelor's degree in an engineering, network or a technical discipline
is required.
  • 5+ years' experience in managing and supporting corporate networks
  • Solid experience in managing network vendors
  • Strong operational leader who can effectively collaborate with multiple
Stake holders.
  • Track record of successful organizational, communication, interpersonal and
relationship skills.
  • Technical ability to understand network configurations. Any certifications are a plus.
  • Ability to multi-task, meet deadlines, deliver
accurate work, and thrive in a fast-paced working environment.
  • Strong organizational and analytical skill
  • In-depth knowledge of TCP/IP, MPLS, Hybrid, SDWAN, QoS with strong deployment and troubleshooting experience
  • Familiar with network monitoring protocols and tools
  • Working knowledge of ITIL framework
  • Good team and relationship builder
  • Excellent documentation skills
  • Fluency in English. Any other language is a plus.
description.company:
Are you looking for a place to work that will inspire and challenge you? A place to unleash your potential? Then the PageGroup Barcelona Shared Service Centre (SSC), with its flexible, open culture and meritocratic structure is the place for you. From 1976 and our first office in London we have grown into one of the world's leading recruitment consultancies, with 140 offices in 36 countries and over 7,000 employees. You could say the sun never sets on PageGroup - or your professional journey with us. PageGroup is a global company made stronger through our multiculturalism and diversity - in Barcelona we have over 30 nationalities in one location. We are a diversity champion, winning awards in the UK and throughout Europe for our efforts. What our employees say about us helps us take the right direction - after all, being a 'Top Employer' in 8 European countries is no easy feat.
Find out more here: https://www.pagepersonnel.es/clientprofile/pagegroup-shared-services-centre

• Partner with Regional Business Leader to accomplish business objectives while supporting the Company Mission, Vision and Values.
  • Apply knowledge and experience to develop a range of alternative solutions to human resource issues.
  • Identify and drive appropriate courses of action, lead project teams and drive initiatives.
  • Analyze trends and metrics in partnership with the corporate HR group to develop solutions, programs and policies.
  • Drive the strategic workforce planning process (incl. apprentice and students' programs) utilizing the Company competency framework and support the company's succession planning.
  • Partner with Business Leader to determine and anticipate staffing needs and business changes
  • Oversees the region's recruitment and selection practices to ensure the greatest number of highly qualified candidates is referred for each open position; ensures interview and selection techniques are in compliance with organization policies and procedures, as well as applicable laws and regulations.
  • Partner with local management, corporate HR functions and outside resources to seek all appropriate approvals, describe and evaluate positions, evaluate and assess candidates, and select and onboard new hires.
  • Work with Comp& Ben Centre of Excellence in order to create an overview of compensation packages and work conditions in the assigned region.
  • Lead the functional organizational development efforts by coaching managers and employees in the areas of Performance Management, Succession Planning, Training and Development.
  • Support the function business leader and the Comp& Benefits experts in the annual Reward cycle in order to reinforce High performance Culture.
  • Support the function leadership team in reinforce the Leadership competencies.
  • Coordinate with the Talent development team to Conduct training need analysis.
  • Coordinate and/or deliver required programs for leaders, managers and specific groups of associates.
  • Assist leaders in assessing and identifying talents, and increasing visibility of High Potential talents.
  • For High Potential employees, support creating tools to diagnose which areas require development, link these areas to employee performance, and ensure that the necessary development tools and programs are available.
  • Support with the creation of development plans for High Potential associates, monitor their development progress, and provide career coaching.
  • Championing demonstration of Company values.
  • Contributes to special projects as identified by the HR and/or Business leaders, ensuring project outcomes are achieved or progress on track in accordance with a project plan.

For their developing Financial Center of Excellence in Poznań we are looking to hire candidates for the roles within RtR department.

Our Client is an international manufacturing organization. In order to strengthen the team, we are seeking to recruit a talented professional for the newly created position of Finance Director.
The successful candidate will be responsible for both financial accounting as well as all cost accounting aspects of the plant, partnering with the regional management team in successfully managing the manufacturing operations and meeting financial objectives. Finance Manager will implement a financial and controlling best practices including management reporting, analysis, forecasting for the plant management team and divisional leadership at HQ. Key areas of focus include monthly KPI performance analysis, budget/forecast development, and support/analysis of cost reduction initiatives.

description.role:
W rekrutacji żaden dzień nie jest taki sam! To powiedziawszy, możesz spodziewać się zaangażowania w:
  • Budowanie znakomitych relacji z kandydatami i klientami
  • Ocenę i odpowiadanie na potrzeby każdego klienta w celu zapewnienia wyjątkowej i terminowej obsługi
  • Zarządzanie relacjami z kandydatem od etapu wstępnych poszukiwań do złożenia oferty pracy
  • Doradzanie kandydatom w zakresie tworzenia CV i przygotowania się do rozmowy kwalifikacyjnej
  • Zarządzanie własnymi zadaniami

bulletPoints.bulletPoints_0: Top Employer w Polsce i w Europie
bulletPoints.bulletPoints_1: Rozwijaj swoją karierę wykonując satysfakcjonującą pracę!

description.candidate:
Poszukujemy osób, które na swojej ścieżce kariery miały styczność z rekrutacją, sprzedażą czy konsultingiem.
Także inne doświadczenia - w branży sportowej, szkolnictwie lub w nieruchomościach - mogą być cennym
zasobem, który pozwoli ci odnieść sukces w PageGroup.
Konsultant ds. rekrutacji w PageGroup powinien dzielić nasze wartości:
- Pracujemy z pasją
- Inspirujemy do zmian
- Kochamy to, co robimy
- Jesteśmy zespołem
- Cenimy wytrwałość
Rekrutacja jest zarówno pełna wyzwań, jak i ekscytująca. Twoje nakierowanie na sukces, entuzjazm, energia i
dbałość o to, by usługi oferowane naszym klientom i kandydatom były najwyższej jakości, staną się podstawą
twoich sukcesów i rozwoju kariery w PageGroup.
description.company: W sercu biznesu PageGroup są tysiące ludzi, których życie zmienia się na lepsze! Najwyższej jakości usługi, które świadczymy dla naszych klientów i kandydatów oraz możliwość rozwoju we wszystkich naszych biurach na całym świecie. Jesteśmy dumni, że możemy wyznaczyć standardy w rekrutacji - nasze specjalistyczne usługi mają wpływ na życie kandydatów, którym umożliwimy osiągnięcie pełni ich potencjału.
description.deal:
W PageGroup wynagrodzimy cię nie tylko finansowo - choć nasze bardzo konkurencyjne wynagrodzenia podstawowe, atrakcyjne bonusy osobiste i zespołowe, coroczne wycieczki dla najlepszych oraz dodatkowe zachęty to dobry początek/ PageGroup oferuje najbardziej atrakcyjny pakiet wynagrodzeń w branży.
Poza tym, nigdy nie zapomnimy, jak ważne jest zdrowie i dobre samopoczucie naszych pracowników - zmieniamy ich życie, oferując im środowisko pracy sprzyjające budowaniu zaufania i osiąganiu świetnych wyników. Zachęcamy do prowadzenia zdrowego trybu życia i utrzymywania równowagi pomiędzy sferą prywatną, a zawodową - zapewniając ulopy macierzyńskie i ojcowskie, oferując pakiety sportowe, pracę zdalną, prywatne ubezpieczenie zdrowotne oraz owoce w biurze. Wpieramy również samorozwój naszych pracowników i nadajemy rozpęd ich karierom.

summary.content: Stanowisko konsultanta ds. rekrutacji oznacza pracę w szybkim tempie i możliwość rozwijania wielu przydatnych umiejętności. Jednego dnia czeka się spotkanie z klientem, innego prowadzenie rozmów z kandydatami. Nauczysz się budować biznes, zapewniać profesjonalne doradztwo dla klienta i o wiele więcej! To także praca, w której będziesz miał wpływ na przyszłość firm i kandydatów.
summary.title: Konsultant ds. rekrutacji

  • Excellence Procurement especially in the area of Purchase-to-Pay processes

description.company:
PageGroup is one of the world's leading professional recruitment consultancies. Established as a specialized recruitment firm in 1976, we have grown organically over these years to establish ourselves as one of the best-known, most respected and leading recruitment consultancies in the world, employing more than 7,000 people in 34 countries in Europe, Middle East and Africa, Americas and Asia Pacific.
Our Page Executive business is dedicated to top management position and executive search solutions. We have specialized international teams in the following practice areas: Industrial, Consumer Goods, Financial Services, Healthcare & Life Sciences, ICT, Professional Services, Finance and Human Resources. PageGroup is one of the world's leading professional recruitment consultancies. Established as a specialized recruitment firm in 1976, we have grown organically over these years to establish ourselves as one of the best-known, most respected and leading recruitment consultancies in the world, employing more than 7,000 people in 34 countries in Europe, Middle East and Africa, Americas and Asia Pacific.
Our Page Executive business is dedicated to top management position and executive search solutions. Our team is represented by a network of over 150 specialized executive search consultants in 24 offices globally. With over 1,600 executive recruitments per year, Page Executive remains one of the leaders of the executive search market.

description.role:
A person hired at this position will be responsible for:
  • Developing project master plan, reviewing and distributing as appropriate including all applicable customer and the company milestones;
  • Making sure that all necessary project activities have been defined;
  • Defining objectives, deliverables and targets (customer & the company) within the project and communicated to all cross-functional team members;
  • Ensuring that tasks and deliverables are anticipated, planned and shared with the project team members;
  • Negotiating deadlines with the customers;
  • Defining the necessary resources to meet the targets and develops the program budget accordingly;
  • Fulfilling all the customer specifications (milestones, quality, logistic, packaging, environment, …);
  • Ensuring that the program financial indicators are managed in line with the agreed project request;
  • Representing the company in customer project reviews;
  • Confirming that technical changes (ECRs) are executed by securing the program and by improving the profitability;
  • Ensures that any supplier sourcing decision is in line with the program budget;
  • Accepting or refusing the sending of any pre-series part to the customer;
  • Controlling expenditures against the approved budget and belongs to the approval process;
  • Performing risk analysis assessment and propose corrective actions for solving or escalation.

bulletPoints.bulletPoints_0: Experienced Candidate in project / program management in automotive sector;
bulletPoints.bulletPoints_1: Strong leadership and experience in managing teams;

• University Degree in Engineering or similar technical qualification;

  • Background in project management, financial and P&L understanding;
  • Experience in project / program management in Automotive sector (product development or manufacturing);
  • Strong leadership and experience in managing teams.

description.role:
• Owns and is responsible for standardization and improvement of record to report processes globally Implements a global standard process model for record to report from a process, people and technology perspective
  • Build roadmap for best practice 'to be' design of R2R process and as global owner support and manage realisation of such roadmap
  • Continue to seek out best practice in the R2R area in line with technological advancements and pilot new solutions where it enhances the effectiveness and efficiency of this process area.
  • Design the R2R process to optimally fit and interact with the Shared Service delivery mode
  • Work with other process owners within the Global team to prioritize initiatives and allocate shared resources.
  • Communicating with and influencing key stakeholders within the assigned region to ensure mutual understanding of objectives and priorities.
  • Responsible for delivering change management through engagement with the business (at all levels); to use informal and formal networks and local teams and to move all countries to the standard business process for R2R.
  • Engage through network and local teams to adhere to the global Standard Business Process (SBP) model and understand and approve potential localizations and exceptions. Lead process of escalations to bring conflict to resolution.

bulletPoints.bulletPoints_1: The role of the GPO is to establish a strategy and vision for the end-to-end R2R

description.role:
* Serve as a primary system administrator for the Salesforce.com environment with 300+ internal users, 300+ partner community users, and thousands of customer community users.
* Handle all basic administrative functions including user account maintenance, reports and dashboards, workflows and other routine tasks * Complete regular internal system audits and prepare for upgrades.
* Manage Salesforce.com data feeds and other integrations.
* Coordinate the evaluation, scope and completion of new development requests.
* Work within the System Change process and ticketing system to support administrative, development, and change management activities.
* Assist in training of new users, and grow the Salesforce.com skill set across the organization.
* Effectively act as the liaison between our users, vendors and the application development teams.
* Work independently with members of the user community to define and document development requirements.

bulletPoints.bulletPoints_0: The Systems Administrator will serve in a three-person team.
bulletPoints.bulletPoints_1: This role is part technical project manager and part administrator.

description.candidate:
* Minimum two years of experience as a Salesforce.com administrator
* Saleforce.com Admin (ADM201 and ADM211) certified * Sales Cloud, Service Cloud and Developer certifications preferred
* Proven ability to design and implement new processes and facilitate user adoption
* Strong understanding of the platform, with the ability to build custom apps and objects, formula fields, workflows, custom views, and other content of intermediate complexity
* Strong understanding of Salesforce.com best practices and functionality
* Strong data management abilities
* A documented history of successfully driving projects to completion
* A demonstrated ability to understand and articulate complex requirements
* Experience with FinancialForce, Communities, Lightning Experience, Salesforce CPQ, Pardot, AvaTax, and DataLoader-type tools a plus Skills Required:
* Excellent project management skills and a positive attitude
* Demonstrated ability to meet deadlines, handle and prioritize simultaneous requests, and manage laterally and upwards
* Creative and analytical thinker with strong problem-solving skills
* Must demonstrate exceptional verbal and written communication skills
* Must demonstrate ability to communicate effectively at all levels of the organization
* Ability to critically evaluate information gathered from multiple sources, reconcile conflicts, decompose high-level information into details, abstract up from low-level information to a general understanding, and distinguish user requests from the underlying true needs
* Ability to assess the impact of new requirements on Salesforce.com and all upstream and downstream applications, systems and processes

Jesteśmy jedną z najbardziej rozpoznawalnych firm doradztwa personalnego na świecie. Nasz zespół to ponad 6,000 konsultantów w 36 krajach. Jesteśmy organizacją notowaną na giełdzie papierów wartościowych w Londynie.
Działalność w Polsce rozpoczęliśmy w 2005 roku. Obecnie nasz polski odział to zespół 100 konsultantów pracujących w 3 biurach w Polsce - Warszawie, Katowicach i Wrocławiu.
Od 4 lat jesteśmy wyróżniani tytułem Top Employer, jako jedyna firma rekrutacyjna w Polsce.
W ciągu ostatnich 5 lat jesteśmy jedną z najszybciej rozwijających się firm w Polsce w obszarze rekrutacji stałych. Naszą praktykę IT budujemy od 2013 roku.   • Udział w formułowaniu strategii biznesowej, planów i budżetów działów
  • Inicjowanie oraz wdrażanie nowych rozwiązań technologicznych
  • Zapewnienie i kontrolowanie warunków związanych z BHP

bulletPoints.bulletPoints_1: Produkcja "custom made" urzadzeń elektronicznych dla klienta B2B

description.candidate:
• Wyższe wykształcenie techniczne
  • Minimum 3 lata doświadczenia na analogicznym stanowisku w branży elektronicznej lub pokrewnej
  • Minimum 5 lat doświadczenia w międzynarodowych firmach produkcyjnych
  • Poparte sukcesami doświadczenie w produkcji "custom made"
  • Znajomość nowoczesnych metod i trendów w zakresie zarządzania procesami produkcyjnymi
  • Otwartość, komunikatywność, zdolności liderskie oraz nastawienie na realizację celów biznesowych
  • Doświadczenie w zarządzaniu zmianą będzie dodatkowym atutem
  • Dobra znajomość języka angielskiego
description.company: Naszym klientem jest firma produkcyjna z branży elektronicznej zlokalizowana w woj. Kujawsko-Pomorskim. Organizacja należy do międzynarodowej grupy będącej globalnym liderem w zakresie rozwiązań które oferują, która posiada kilkanaście zakładów produkcyjnych na świecie.
description.deal:
• Wynagrodzenie adekwatne do zdobytego doświadczenia zawodowego
  • Możliwości rozwoju zawodowego oraz współpraca z doświadczoną kadrą menadżerską
  • Praca u lidera w swoim sektorze

summary.content: Dla naszego klienta, międzynarodowej firmy produkcyjnej, poszukujemy doświadczonych kandydatów na stanowisko Dyrektora Zakładu. Osoba zrekrutowana będzie bezpośrednio raportować do Zarządu w Polsce oraz współpracować z doświadczoną kadrą zarządzającą w ramach Grupy. Preferowany profil kandydata to osoba z doświadczeniem w obszarze produkcji "custom made".
summary.title: Plant Manager - Automatyka Przemysłowa
